amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part C of House Report 118-280 to express a Sense of Congress that Qatar should condemn Hamas, turn over Hamas leadership to US and Israeli custody, and pledge never to facilitate the transfer of covered Iranian funds to Iran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
